text: The 2002 Taça de Angola was the 21st edition of the Taça de Angola, the second most important and the top knock-out football club competition following the Girabola. Petro de Luanda beat Desportivo da Huíla 3–0 in the final to secure its 8th title. The winner qualified to the 2003 African Cup Winners' Cup. ==Stadiums and locations== {|class="wikitable sortable" |- ! P ! Team ! Home city ! Stadium ! Capacity ! 2001 ! Current !
